# pinColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the pin head.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pinColor: MKPinAnnotationColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The Maps application uses different pin colors for different types of map annotations. Your own map annotation should use the available pin colors in the same way. For a description of when to use each type of pin, see the constants of [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPinAnnotationColor].

## Properties

- **filterType**: The filter options for the search results.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **mapType**: The map’s visual style.
